description.zh-cn: 明朝第三位皇帝，朱元璋第四子。其生母身份是明朝历史上的一个悬案。他通过靖难之役从侄子建文帝手中夺取皇位。
description.en: The third emperor of the Ming Dynasty, the fourth son of Zhu Yuanzhang. The identity of his biological mother is a historical mystery of the Ming Dynasty. He seized the throne from his nephew, the Jianwen Emperor, through the Jingnan Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 明朝的开国皇帝。
description.en: The founding emperor of the Ming Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 朱元璋的皇后。根据明朝官方记载，她是明成祖朱棣的生母，但此说存在争议。
description.en: The empress of Zhu Yuanzhang. According to official Ming records, she was the biological mother of Emperor Chengzu (Zhu Di), but this claim is disputed.

description.zh-cn: 根据《南京太常寺志》记载，她是明成祖朱棣的生母。其在明孝陵享殿的神位独西列，与其他东列的妃嫔不同。
description.en: According to the 'Records of the Nanjing Ministry of Rites', she was the biological mother of Emperor Chengzu (Zhu Di). Her spirit tablet in the Ming Xiaoling Mausoleum's sacrificial hall was placed alone on the west side, separate from the other concubines on the east.

description.zh-cn: 朱元璋长子，明朝第一位皇太子，建文帝的父亲。
description.en: The eldest son of Zhu Yuanzhang, the first crown prince of the Ming Dynasty, and the father of the Jianwen Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 由燕王朱棣发动的旨在推翻其侄子建文帝的内战。
description.en: A civil war launched by Zhu Di, the Prince of Yan, to overthrow his nephew, the Jianwen Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 明朝第二位皇帝，朱标之子，朱元璋之孙。在靖难之役中被其叔叔朱棣推翻。
description.en: The second emperor of the Ming Dynasty, son of Zhu Biao and grandson of Zhu Yuanzhang. He was overthrown by his uncle Zhu Di during the Jingnan Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 朱元璋第五子。有说法称他与明成祖朱棣为同母兄弟。
description.en: The fifth son of Zhu Yuanzhang. Some sources claim he was a full brother to Emperor Chengzu (Zhu Di).

description.zh-cn: 朱元璋颁布的祖制，规定皇位继承须立嫡母所生者，庶母所生虽长不得立。
description.en: Ancestral instructions issued by Zhu Yuanzhang, stipulating that the heir to the throne must be a son born to the primary consort (di son), and that a son of a concubine (shu son) cannot be enthroned even if he is older.

description.zh-cn: 由清政府修撰的明朝官方史书，采纳了明成祖生母是马皇后的说法。
description.en: The official history of the Ming Dynasty compiled by the Qing government, which adopted the view that Emperor Chengzu's mother was Empress Ma.

description.zh-cn: 明朝官方编年史，记载明成祖为孝慈高皇后第四子。
description.en: The official annals of the Ming Dynasty, which record that Emperor Chengzu was the fourth son of Empress Xiaoci Gao.

description.zh-cn: 建文帝时期的官员，曾建议先行削夺与燕王朱棣同母的周王朱橚的藩位，以剪除朱棣的羽翼。
description.en: An official during the reign of the Jianwen Emperor, who suggested first stripping Zhu Su, the Prince of Zhou and supposedly Zhu Di's full brother, of his title to weaken Zhu Di.

description.zh-cn: 朱元璋的妃子，齐王朱榑和潭王朱梓的生母。根据《革除遗事》记载，她也是明成祖的生母。
description.en: A concubine of Zhu Yuanzhang, mother of Zhu Fu (Prince of Qi) and Zhu Zi (Prince of Tan). According to 'Gechu Yishi', she was also the biological mother of Emperor Chengzu.

description.zh-cn: 元朝最后一位皇帝。野史中有说法称明成祖是其妃子所生，甚至是其遗腹子。
description.en: The last emperor of the Yuan Dynasty. Unofficial histories claim that Emperor Chengzu was the son of his concubine, or even his posthumous son.

description.zh-cn: 元顺帝的妃子，姓洪吉喇。有野史称她是明成祖的生母，在被朱元璋俘获时已怀有身孕。
description.en: A consort of Emperor Shun of Yuan from the Onggirat clan. Some unofficial histories claim she was the biological mother of Emperor Chengzu and was already pregnant when captured by Zhu Yuanzhang.

description.zh-cn: 来自高丽的妃子，是关于明成祖生母的野史说法之一，有时与元顺帝妃或䂵妃的身份混同。
description.en: A consort from Goryeo, one of the unofficial theories about the mother of Emperor Chengzu, sometimes conflated with the identity of Emperor Shun's consort or Consort Gong.

description.zh-cn: 明成祖朱棣为报答父母之恩所建的寺庙。民间传闻该寺正殿供奉的是其生母䂵妃。
description.en: A temple built by Emperor Chengzu (Zhu Di) in gratitude to his parents. Popular legend claims that the main hall was dedicated to his biological mother, Consort Gong.

description.zh-cn: 记载明孝陵祭祀情况的文献，是提出明成祖生母为䂵妃说的主要来源。
description.en: A document recording the sacrificial arrangements at the Ming Xiaoling Mausoleum, which is the primary source for the theory that Consort Gong was the biological mother of Emperor Chengzu.

description.zh-cn: 朱元璋的妃子。《南京太常寺志》称其为懿文皇太子朱标、秦愍王、晋恭王的生母。
description.en: A concubine of Zhu Yuanzhang. The 'Records of the Nanjing Ministry of Rites' identifies her as the mother of Crown Prince Yiwen (Zhu Biao), Prince Min of Qin, and Prince Gong of Jin.

description.zh-cn: 朱元璋第二子。
description.en: The second son of Zhu Yuanzhang.

description.zh-cn: 朱元璋第三子。
description.en: The third son of Zhu Yuanzhang.

description.zh-cn: 高丽王朝使臣。其出使记录中提及燕王朱棣在七月十五日为“先太后”守忌，与马皇后忌日不符，引发了对朱棣生母的猜测。
description.en: An envoy from the Goryeo Dynasty. His records mention that Zhu Di, Prince of Yan, observed the death anniversary of the 'late empress dowager' on the 15th day of the 7th month, which does not match Empress Ma's death anniversary, fueling speculation about Zhu Di's biological mother.

description.zh-cn: 中国近代学者，曾对明成祖生母问题进行研究，认为朱棣为元顺帝高丽妃所生。
description.en: A modern Chinese scholar who researched the issue of Emperor Chengzu's mother and believed that Zhu Di was the son of Emperor Shun of Yuan's Goryeo consort.

description.zh-cn: 中国近代学者，对傅斯年关于明成祖生母的“胡人输血论”观点表示不满。
description.en: A modern Chinese scholar who expressed dissatisfaction with Fu Sinian's 'Hu-ren blood transfusion theory' regarding the mother of Emperor Chengzu.

description.zh-cn: 朱元璋的妃子，于洪武二十五年（1392年）入宫，洪武三十一年（1398年）与李淑妃一同被赐死殉葬。此人物区别于元顺帝的洪吉喇氏妃。
description.en: A concubine of Zhu Yuanzhang who entered the palace in 1392 and was ordered to commit suicide as a sacrificial victim in 1398 along with Consort Li Shu. This person is distinct from the Onggirat consort of Emperor Shun of Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 明成祖是朱元璋的第四子。
description.en: Emperor Chengzu was the fourth son of Zhu Yuanzhang.

description.zh-cn: 此为明朝官方说法，朱棣为自证其继位的正当性，声称自己与太子朱标同为马皇后所生。
description.en: This is the official Ming Dynasty claim. To legitimize his succession, Zhu Di claimed that he, like Crown Prince Zhu Biao, was born to Empress Ma.

description.zh-cn: 根据《南京太常寺志》等记载的说法，䂵妃是明成祖的生母。
description.en: According to sources like the 'Records of the Nanjing Ministry of Rites', Consort Gong was the biological mother of Emperor Chengzu.

description.zh-cn: 根据王世贞所引《革除遗事》的说法，明成祖为达妃之子。
description.en: According to 'Gechu Yishi' as cited by Wang Shizhen, Emperor Chengzu was the son of Consort Da.

description.zh-cn: 根据《蒙古源流》等野史的说法，明成祖生母是元顺帝的洪吉喇氏妃，被朱元璋所纳。
description.en: According to unofficial histories like 'Mongolyn Ertnii Tüükh', Emperor Chengzu's biological mother was the Onggirat consort of Emperor Shun of Yuan, who was taken by Zhu Yuanzhang.

description.zh-cn: 根据部分明人笔记的说法，明成祖为元顺帝的高丽妃所生。
description.en: According to some notes by Ming scholars, Emperor Chengzu was the son of Emperor Shun of Yuan's Goryeo consort.

description.zh-cn: 此为野史说法，认为明成祖是元顺帝的遗腹子。
description.en: This is a theory from unofficial histories, suggesting that Emperor Chengzu was the posthumous son of Emperor Shun of Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 根据《南京太常寺志》的记载，李淑妃是懿文皇太子朱标、秦愍王朱樉、晋恭王朱㭎的生母。
description.en: According to the 'Records of the Nanjing Ministry of Rites', Consort Li Shu was the biological mother of Crown Prince Yiwen (Zhu Biao), Prince Min of Qin (Zhu Shang), and Prince Gong of Jin (Zhu Gang).

description.zh-cn: 根据《南京太常寺志》的记载，李淑妃是懿文皇太子朱标、秦愍王朱樉、晋恭王朱㭎的生母。
description.en: According to the 'Records of the Nanjing Ministry of Rites', Consort Li Shu was the biological mother of Crown Prince Yiwen (Zhu Biao), Prince Min of Qin (Zhu Shang), and Prince Gong of Jin (Zhu Gang).

description.zh-cn: 根据《南京太常寺志》的记载，李淑妃是懿文皇太子朱标、秦愍王朱樉、晋恭王朱㭎的生母。
description.en: According to the 'Records of the Nanjing Ministry of Rites', Consort Li Shu was the biological mother of Crown Prince Yiwen (Zhu Biao), Prince Min of Qin (Zhu Shang), and Prince Gong of Jin (Zhu Gang).

description.zh-cn: 朱棣是朱标的弟弟。官方说法中他们是同母兄弟，均为马皇后所生。
description.en: Zhu Di was Zhu Biao's younger brother. According to the official account, they were full brothers, both born to Empress Ma.

description.zh-cn: 朱棣是朱橚的兄长。部分说法认为他们是同母兄弟，生母并非马皇后。
description.en: Zhu Di was Zhu Su's elder brother. Some theories suggest they were full brothers, and their mother was not Empress Ma.

description.zh-cn: 明成祖（时为燕王朱棣）发动靖难之役，夺取了皇位。
description.en: Emperor Chengzu (then Zhu Di, Prince of Yan) launched the Jingnan Campaign and seized the imperial throne.

description.zh-cn: 靖难之役导致建文帝被推翻，下落不明。
description.en: The Jingnan Campaign resulted in the overthrow of the Jianwen Emperor, whose whereabouts became unknown.

description.zh-cn: 明成祖即位后，为报答父母之恩下令修建大报恩寺。
description.en: After ascending the throne, Emperor Chengzu ordered the construction of the Great Bao'en Temple to repay the kindness of his parents.

description.zh-cn: 朱元璋颁布了《皇明祖训》，其中规定了严格的嫡长子继承制。
description.en: Zhu Yuanzhang promulgated the 'Huang-Ming Zuxun', which stipulated a strict system of primogeniture by the primary consort.

description.zh-cn: 黄子澄向建文帝建议，应先削周王朱橚，因为他是燕王朱棣的同母弟弟，削周即是剪除燕王的手足。
description.en: Huang Zicheng advised the Jianwen Emperor to first target Zhu Su, the Prince of Zhou, because he was the full brother of Zhu Di, the Prince of Yan, and removing him would be like cutting off the Prince of Yan's limbs.

description.zh-cn: 洪武二十二年（1389年），高丽使臣权近在北平拜谒当时还是燕王的朱棣。
description.en: In 1389, Goryeo envoy Gwon Geun visited Zhu Di, who was then the Prince of Yan, in Beiping.

description.zh-cn: 朱希祖因傅斯年坚信朱棣生母为元顺帝妃的观点而表示不满，认为这是“诬辱之尤，淆乱种族”。
description.en: Zhu Xizu expressed dissatisfaction with Fu Sinian's firm belief that Zhu Di's mother was a consort of Emperor Shun of Yuan, considering it a 'grave insult and a confusion of ethnicity'.

description.zh-cn: 洪武三十一年（1398年），朱元璋赐死瓮妃洪吉喇氏，令其殉葬。
description.en: In 1398, Zhu Yuanzhang ordered Consort Weng of the Onggirat clan to commit suicide and be buried with him as a sacrificial victim.

description.zh-cn: 洪武三十一年（1398年），朱元璋赐死李淑妃，令其殉葬。
description.en: In 1398, Zhu Yuanzhang ordered Consort Li Shu to commit suicide and be buried with him as a sacrificial victim.
